message: I'm Prasanna (myprasanna.com) - Co-Founder of Likealittle - A fast growing location based social network. Here are a few of our numbers (lal.com/about/hiring). We are made of some of the finest code writers in the world, who decided to move to the valley. If you are one of them, we should atleast chat, and hopefully we can help each other. I'm available at myprasanna@gmail.com
Well Im a hacker/designer (mainly UI/UX stuff) so if you need me, just give me a shout!
You guys' capabilities are awesome! Good Luck, pretty sure, you make it big.
@LordJawsh  Thanks I'll keep in touch via email. I'm myprasanna@gmail.com
@myprasanna I'm Josh@fifteenandahalf.com - Does your offer apply to international hackers who want to move to the valley?
@LordJawsh Absolutely Josh, we should chat for a bit. Mind sending me an email? myprasanna@gmail.com
